department.dept_long_name: Department of Visual and Environmental Studies

course.title: Film, Media, Space
course.meeting_text: Tuesdays 4pm to 6pm and a mandatory weekly film screening Wednesdays 7pm to 9pm
course.description: This seminar will explore the subtle relations between media to their surroundings, the way in which they develop a reciprocal influence, the capacity of the media to become environments in themselves, the transitions from a space to another, and the effects of these dynamics on the symbolic economy and on the exercise of power.
